Klasse MyJobPostView

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
com.vaadin.flow.component.Composite<com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout>
com.spirit.application.views.profil.Unternehmen.MyJobPostView
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasStyle, com.vaadin.flow.router.AfterNavigationObserver, com.vaadin.flow.router.internal.AfterNavigationHandler, Serializable
@Route(value="unternehmen/my-jobposts", layout=AppView.class) @RolesAllowed("unternehmen") public class MyJobPostView extends com.vaadin.flow.component.Composite<com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout> implements com.vaadin.flow.router.AfterNavigationObserver
View for displaying and managing the job posts created by the currently logged-in company user. This view is accessible only to users with the "UNTERNEHMEN" role.

Users can view their job posts, see details such as title, employment type, location, description, and publish date, and delete job posts if necessary.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • MyJobPostView

      @Autowired public MyJobPostView(SessionService sessionService, JobPostService jobPostService, MarkdownConverter markdownConverter)
      Constructs the `MyJobPostView` with the necessary services and sets up the main layout.
      Parameter:
      sessionService - Service for managing user session data.
      jobPostService - Service for managing job posts.
      markdownConverter - Converter for rendering Markdown content into HTML.

  • Methodendetails

    • getJobPost

      public static JobPostDTO getJobPost(JobPost jobPost)
      Converts a `JobPost` entity into a `JobPostDTO`.
      Parameter:
      jobPost - The `JobPost` entity to convert.
      Gibt zurück:
      A `JobPostDTO` containing the relevant job post details.

    • createJobPostCard

      public com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout createJobPostCard(long id, String baseImage, String businessName, String titleValue, String typeValue, String locationValue, String descriptionValue, Date publishDate)
      Creates a card layout to display details of a single job post.
      Parameter:
      id - The ID of the job post.
      baseImage - The base64-encoded image of the company's avatar.
      businessName - The name of the company that created the job post.
      titleValue - The title of the job post.
      typeValue - The employment type (e.g., full-time, part-time).
      locationValue - The location of the job post.
      descriptionValue - The Markdown-formatted description of the job post.
      publishDate - The date the job post was published.
      Gibt zurück:
      A `VerticalLayout` containing the job post card.

    • createJobPostCards

      public com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout createJobPostCards(List<JobPostDTO> jobPosts)
      Creates a layout containing all job post cards for the current company.
      Parameter:
      jobPosts - A list of `JobPostDTO` objects representing the company's job posts.
      Gibt zurück:
      A `VerticalLayout` containing all job post cards.

      Angegeben von:
